name: Masjid API
shortdesc: Islamic API for Salah Times and Quranic Ayah lookup.
longdesc: Masjid API is a general-purpose Islamic API that provides accurate Salah (prayer) times and Quranic Ayah lookup functionality. Designed for developers looking to integrate Islamic data into applications efficiently and reliably.

name: Calculator App
shortdesc: A student-friendly score and grade calculator.
longdesc: This terminal-based calculator allows students to compute scores, grades, and weighted averages using standard input-output operations. Built in C++ with optimized handling of user input for a seamless experience.

name: GW2 API Testing 0.1
shortdesc: A Shiny app to track Guild Wars 2 item prices.
longdesc: A simple interactive R Shiny app that connects to the Guild Wars 2 API to fetch and display item prices for five selected in-game items. It provides a visual representation of price trends for traders and enthusiasts.

name: Library System
shortdesc: A lightweight library management web app.
longdesc: A simple library management system built using vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Allows users to add, edit, and remove books while keeping track of available inventory.

name: Ninja Game
shortdesc: A ninja-themed browser game using P5.js.
longdesc: A ninja-themed platformer built using P5.js and JavaScript Canvas. Features jumping mechanics, enemy AI, and attack combos to create a full in-browser game experience.

name: LofiModoro
shortdesc: Pomodoro timer with integrated Spotify music playback.
longdesc: LofiModoro is a modern productivity app that combines the Pomodoro technique with a built-in Spotify music player. Helps users stay focused while enjoying curated lofi beats.
